import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent { cartItems = [ { name: 'Mobile Phone', price: 699 }, { name: 'Laptop', price: 1299 } ]; }
